etymology.description: Derived directly from 衣(衣) (yī, "clothing") -> abbreviated to form the clothing radical
etymology.interpretation: 衤(yī, "clothing radical") is an abbreviated form of 衣(衣) (yī, "clothing"), used primarily as a left-side radical to symbolize elements related to clothing.
etymology.simplification: This form is already simplified from 衣(衣) (yī, "clothing") by omitting strokes for use as a radical. No further simplification exists as it's already an abbreviated form.

examples.chinese: 含有衤的汉字通常与衣物有关(含有衤的漢字通常與衣物有關)。
examples.pinyin: Hán yǒu yī de hànzì tōngcháng yǔ yīwù yǒuguān.
examples.english: Chinese characters that contain the radical '衤' are usually related to clothing.

examples.chinese: 学习偏旁部首时(學習偏旁部首時)，我们常能发现代表衣物的衤(我們常能發現代表衣物的衤)。
examples.pinyin: Xuéxí piānpáng bùshǒu shí, wǒmen cháng néng fāxiàn dàibiǎo yīwù de yī.
examples.english: While studying radicals, we often encounter the radical '衤' that represents clothing.
